articles.author: NBC News
articles.title: Tensions arise over Speaker Mike Johnson's efforts to bring Rep. Elise Stefanik back into the fold
articles.description: After Trump pulled Stefanik’s nomination to be U.S. ambassador to the U.N., Johnson faces a conundrum on how to place her on a key committee.
articles.content: WASHINGTON — When President Donald Trump withdrew Rep. Elise Stefanik’s nomination to be U.S. ambassador to the United Nations, she was given private assurances that she would not only rejoin the House GOP leadership team, but also reclaim her covete... [6523 chars]

articles.author: The Globe and Mail
articles.title: Trump threatens sanctions, tariffs on Mexico in water dispute
articles.description: Under the 1944 treaty, Mexico must send 1.75 million acre-feet of water to the U.S. from the Rio Grande every five years
articles.content:
U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday threatened Mexico with sanctions and tariffs in a dispute over water sharing between the two countries, accusing Mexico of breaking an 81-year-old treaty and “stealing the water from Texas Farmers.”
Under the 1... [3339 chars]

articles.author: WEAU
articles.title: Supreme Court says Trump administration must work to bring back mistakenly deported Maryland man
articles.description: The Supreme Court said the Trump administration must facilitate the return of a man who was mistakenly deported to El Salvador.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) — The Supreme Court on Thursday said the Trump administration must work to bring back a Maryland man who was mistakenly deported to prison in El Salvador, rejecting the administration’s emergency appeal.

articles.title: Tariffs loom over Quebec’s ADF Group as stock value crashes on lower sales, profit warnings
articles.description: The company had reported growth in revenue and earnings for its fiscal year ended Jan. 31, but those results are overshadowed by Trump’s trade policy

articles.author: The Guardian
articles.title: Retailers fear Trump tariffs gloom will worsen footfall on UK high streets
articles.description: Shoppers stayed away in March as footfall declined 5% and stores worry US trade war could have chilling effect
articles.content:
Shoppers stayed away from the UK high street in March, a situation retailers said could worsen if the economic gloom caused by Donald Trump’s tariff war hits consumer confidence.

articles.title: Supreme court orders US to help return man wrongly deported to El Salvador
articles.description: Justices uphold judge’s order and say Trump officials must ‘facilitate’ return of Kilmar Abrego Garcia to United States
articles.content:
The US supreme court upheld on Thursday a judge’s order requiring Donald Trump’s administration to facilitate the return to the United States of a Salvadoran man who the government has acknowledged was deported in error to El Salvador.
